item.title: New bird flu variant found in Nevada dairy cows has experts sounding alarms: ‘We have never been closer to a pandemic from this virus’
item.description: Dairy herds in Nevada have been infected by a version of the H5N1 bird flu not previously seen in cows, putting virologists on high alert.

item.title: Investigators are starting to arrest high-tech international thieves targeting US superstar athletes like Patrick Mahomes
item.description: “These individuals seem to be the alleged tip of the iceberg,” said Kenneth Parker, the U.S. Attorney in southern Ohio.

item.title: Musk’s DOGE team now seeks access to Treasury’s accounting data
item.description: Musk will dispatch a DOGE team to Parkersburg, West Virginia, where it will gain read-only access to the US government’s central accounting system.

item.title: What does Trump really want from Canada and Mexico? It may come down to oil security and bringing both countries ‘under the US’s thumb’
item.description: "This means both a reliable, unimpeded flow of oil and natural resources from Canada and a safer Mexico. And that means both countries under the US’s ...

item.title: Elon Musk says he doesn’t want to buy TikTok’s US business
item.description: “I have not put in a bid for TikTok,” Musk said. “I don’t have any plans for what would I do if I had TikTok.”
